<html>
<head>
<style>
    #chart {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
    }

    .bar {
      fill: steelblue;
    }

    .bar:hover {
      fill: brown;
    }

    .axis {
      font: 10px sans-serif;
    }

    .axis path,
    .axis line {
      fill: none;
      stroke: #000;
      shape-rendering: crispEdges;
    }

    .x.axis path {
      display: none;
    }
</style>
</head>
<body>
<svg id="chart" viewBox="0 0 400 400" preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid"></svg>
<script src="js/d3.v3.min.js"></script>
<script src="js/revenue.js"></script>
</body>
</html>
